sports.name: Hero Blossam 16T 16 T Single Speed Road Cycle  (Blue)
sports.desc: Take up cycling and regain your healthy with this Hero Octane Parkour cycle.This aluminium-frame cycle has sturdy fat tyres, V-brakes, a steel handlebar,and an extension stem.

reviews.title: Value-for-money
reviews.description: Good to have this with me

reviews.title: Decent product
reviews.description: Hi Cycle is looking very nice ,it was delivered also on time as it was scheduled. But reflectors show in wheels were not received. Riding experience is also good .cycle is very light weight. I have enjoyed riding this bicycle.
